rules_text:
When Redefinition enters, up to one target creature's power and toughness each become equal to Redefinition's power and toughness until Redefinition leaves the battlefield.
Reflect {1} [i]({1}: Create a token copy of this creature, except it's a 1/1 Wonder Jellyfish without reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery, and only once.)[/i]
